summary: THIS INVOLVES A 2000 CHEVROLET SILVERADO.  VIN [XXX].  ON MULTIPLE OCCASIONS THE TRUCK FAILED TO STOP.  ON THE LAST OCCASION,  IT WAS COASTING DOWN A DRIVE WAY, TRAVELING LESS THAN 10 M.P.H.   THE DRIVER HAD HIS FOOT ON THE BRAKE THE ENTIRE TIME, WHEN, ONCE AGAIN, THE TRUCK FAILED TO STOP AND HIT A BLOCK WALL. IT WAS A DRY SUNNY DAY.    INFORMATION REDACTED PURSUANT TO THE FREEDOM OF INFORMATION ACT (FOIA), 5 U.S.C. 552(B)(6).  *TR
